```lisp
[
  (:action gather
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?resource - object ?location - place)
    :precondition (and 
                    (at ?agent ?location)
                    (available ?resource ?location)
                    (not (gathered ?agent ?resource)))
    :effect (and
              (gathered ?agent ?resource)
              (not (available ?resource ?location)))),
              
  (:action create
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?resource - object ?location - place)
    :precondition (and 
                    (at ?agent ?location)
                    (available ?resource ?location)
                    (not (created ?resource ?location)))
    :effect (and
              (created ?resource ?location)
              (not (available ?resource ?location)))),
              
  (:action light
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?resource - flammable)
    :precondition (and 
                    (spark_created ?resource) 
                    (not (lit ?resource)))
    :effect (lit ?resource)),
    
  (:action scavenge
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?location - area ?resource - object)
    :precondition (and
                    (at ?agent ?location)
                    (available ?resource ?location))
    :effect (and
              (collected ?agent ?resource)
              (not (available ?resource ?location))))
]
```
